about_the_game:
Dungeons of Desire is a sexy action-packed dungeon crawling adventure. Fight your way through procedurally generated dungeons to the Palace of the Queen of Lust; a seductive succubus who reigns over the kingdom of lust, harvesting the sexual energy of its inhabitants.


Features


  • Engage with a unique one-handed combat system that's easy to learn, hard to master
  • Time your attacks and blocks to defeat a wide variety of horny monsters
  • Level up and collect powerful items that compliment your playstyle
  • Explore procedurally generated dungeons, no two playthroughs will be the same!


  • Harvest defeated monsters to recover from injuries
  • Unique multi-stage sex scenes for every enemy, including bosses!
  • Unlock scenes permanently in the gallery, to be viewed anytime
  • Romance sexy locals and invite them to your room, any item obtained in the dungeons can be given as a gift

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted in this game are adults. The game contains female and male nudity, violence, consensual sex and pornographic scenes between fantasy characters and monsters.

This game contains highly explicit sexual content that is intended for adults only.

name: Dungeons of Desire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA since 2006 (GeForce 8), AMD since 2006 (Radeon HD 2000), Intel since 2012 (HD 4000 / IvyBridge)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Must support the ASIO audio device interface for multi-channel recording / playback, or support WDM (Windows Driver Model) audio.

short_description: Fight your way through a lust laden labyrinth, infested with horny hobgoblins, kinky kobolds, and orgasming orcs in this lewd dungeon crawling roguelike adventure that can be played with one hand.
